title: Mushroom Pulao
description: A fragrant blend of rice and mushrooms, a symphony of flavors in every spoonful.
steps: Wash and soak the rice for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds.
Add onions, garlic, and ginger. Sauté until onions turn translucent.
Add mushrooms and spices. Cook for a few minutes.
Drain the soaked rice and add it to the pan. Stir well.
Add water and salt. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is cooked.
Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot.

title: Egg Fried Rice
description: Fluffy rice meets scrambled eggs and a savory medley of veggies, wok-tossed to perfection.
ingredients: 1/2 cup mixed vegetables (peas, carrots, bell peppers)
steps: Heat oil in a pan and scramble the beaten eggs. Remove and set aside.
In the same pan, add more oil if needed and stir-fry the mixed vegetables until tender.
Add cooked rice and soy sauce. Stir-fry until well combined.
Add the scrambled eggs and season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with chopped green onions and serve hot.

title: Veg Fried Rice
description: A riot of colors and flavors, where fresh vegetables take center stage in this delightful stir-fry.
ingredients: 1 cup mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, bell peppers, etc.)
steps: Heat vegetable oil in a pan or wok
Add chopped onions and minced garlic, sauté until fragrant
Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry until tender
Add cooked rice, soy sauce, sesame oil, salt, and pepper
Stir-fry until everything is well combined and heated through
Serve hot

title: Egg Briyani
description: Fragrant and spicy, a royal treat where eggs and aromatic spices reign supreme.
steps: Wash and soak the rice for 30 minutes.
Hard-boil the eggs, peel, and cut them in half.
In a large pan, heat oil and ghee. Add sliced onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste, chopped tomatoes, and cook until tomatoes soften.
Add turmeric powder, red chili powder, and garam masala. Cook for a minute.
Add yogurt and mix well. Cook until oil separates.
Add chopped mint and coriander leaves.
Add boiled eggs and gently mix.
In a separate pot, cook the soaked rice until 70% cooked. Drain and set aside.
Layer the cooked rice and egg masala in a biryani pot.
Sprinkle saffron milk on top (if using).
Cover and cook on low heat for 20-25 minutes until the rice is fully cooked and aromatic.
Serve hot and enjoy your Egg Biryani!

title: Chicken Briyani
description: A regal feast of succulent chicken, fragrant rice, and a symphony of spices.
steps: Wash and soak the rice for 30 minutes.
Marinate chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, red chili powder, and salt. Let it sit for 30 minutes.
In a large pan, heat oil and ghee. Add sliced onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they turn soft.
Add marinated chicken and cook until it's partially cooked.
Add garam masala, chopped mint, and coriander leaves.
In a separate pot, cook the soaked rice until 70% cooked. Drain and set aside.
Layer the cooked rice and chicken masala in a biryani pot.
Sprinkle saffron milk on top (if using).
Cover and cook on low heat for 20-25 minutes until the rice is fully cooked and aromatic.
Serve hot and enjoy your Chicken Biryani!

title: Prawn Briyani
description: An oceanic delight, where plump prawns meet fragrant basmati rice in a seafood lover's dream.
steps: Wash and soak the rice for 30 minutes.
Marinate prawns with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, red chili powder, and salt. Let it sit for 30 minutes.
In a large pan, heat oil and ghee. Add sliced onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they turn soft.
Add marinated prawns and cook until they are no longer translucent.
Add garam masala, chopped mint, and coriander leaves.
In a separate pot, cook the soaked rice until 70% cooked. Drain and set aside.
Layer the cooked rice and prawn masala in a biryani pot.
Sprinkle saffron milk on top (if using).
Cover and cook on low heat for 20-25 minutes until the rice is fully cooked and aromatic.
Serve hot and enjoy your Prawn Biryani!
